patthana3.4:1.1_0: Noāsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:2.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… kamme ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:4.1_0: Āsavaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:5.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:6.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:8.1_0: Āsavo akusalo dhammo āsavassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:9.1_0: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (majjhe tiṇṇaṁ sahajātādhipati labbhati), anantare nava …pe…
patthana3.4:9.1_1: upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi …pe…
patthana3.4:10.1_0: Noāsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:11.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:14.1_0: Sāsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:15.1_0: Anāsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:16.1_0: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ, anulomaṁ.)
patthana3.4:17.1_0: Naadhipatiyā dve …pe… naāsevane ekaṁ …pe… navippayutte dve.
patthana3.4:18.1_0: Sāsavo kusalo dhammo sāsavassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:19.1_0: Anāsavo kusalo dhammo anāsavassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:20.1_0: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve …pe…
patthana3.4:20.1_1: nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, āsevane dve …pe…
patthana3.4:21.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana3.4:22.1_0: Sāsavaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:23.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:25.1_0: Sāsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:26.1_0: Anāsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:26.1_1: Anāsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:26.1_2: Anāsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato ca anāsavo abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:27.1_0: Sāsavaṁ abyākatañca anāsavaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:28.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca …pe…
patthana3.4:29.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte naāsevane pañca, nakamme …pe…
patthana3.4:31.1_0: Sāsavo abyākato dhammo sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:32.1_0: Anāsavo abyākato dhammo anāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:33.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā anantare samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte dve, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme …pe…
patthana3.4:33.1_1: magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe…
patthana3.4:34.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana3.4:36.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:37.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:39.1_0: Āsavasampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.4:40.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:41.1_0: Āsavasampayuttaṁ akusalañca āsavavippayuttaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:42.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana3.4:43.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca …pe…
patthana3.4:43.1_1: nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, navippayutte pañca.
patthana3.4:44.1_0: Āsavasampayutto akusalo dhammo āsavasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.4:45.1_0: Āsavavippayutto akusalo dhammo āsavasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:46.1_0: Āsavasampayutto akusalo ca āsavavippayutto akusalo ca dhammā āsavasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:47.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekaṁ, anantare samanantare nava, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye pañca, upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca …pe…
patthana3.4:48.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana3.4:49.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:50.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:51.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe ekaṁ, naadhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… novigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:53.1_0: Āsavavippayutto abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:54.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:55.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana3.4:57.1_0: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:58.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:60.1_0: Āsavañceva sāsavañca akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.4:61.1_0: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.4:62.1_0: Āsavañceva sāsavañca akusalañca sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.4:63.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:64.1_0: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:65.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana3.4:67.1_0: Āsavo ceva sāsavoca akusalo dhammo āsavassa ceva sāsavassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:68.1_0: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe…
patthana3.4:68.1_1: upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe…
patthana3.4:69.1_0: Āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo āsavassa ceva sāsavassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana3.4:73.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana3.4:74.1_0: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:75.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:78.1_0: Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.4:79.1_0: Āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.4:80.1_0: Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca akusalañca āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.4:81.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:82.1_0: Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā.
patthana3.4:83.1_0: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana3.4:85.1_0: Āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo āsavassa ceva āsavasampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:86.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe…
patthana3.4:86.1_1: upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe…
patthana3.4:90.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana3.4:92.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:92.1_1: Āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto anāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:93.1_0: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.4:95.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:96.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:96.1_1: Āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:96.1_2: Āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato ca āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:97.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ abyākatañca āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:98.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca …pe…
patthana3.4:98.1_1: āsevane ekaṁ, kamme pañca, vipāke pañca …pe…
patthana3.4:99.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:100.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dve …pe…
patthana3.4:100.1_1: napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte naāsevane pañca, nakamme navipāke …pe…
patthana3.4:101.1_0: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.4:102.1_0: Āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:103.1_0: Āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:103.1_1: Āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:103.1_2: Āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa abyākatassa ca āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa abyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:104.1_0: Āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:105.1_0: Āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:105.1_1: Āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:106.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri …pe…
patthana3.4:107.1_0: Āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana3.4:111.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
